pages.text: Spirit Blooms are blue flowers found in the Mangrove Swamp or Swamp Biome.
Dreamshrooms are found in the Old Growth Pine Taiga or Mushroom Fields biome.
Siren Kelp are found in the bottom of Ocean or Deep Ocean biomes.
Ghost Fern can be found in the $(l:hexalia:biomes/enchanted_bayou)Enchanted Bayou$().
